name: Space AR X Rocket Trainer
description:
Free - with Ads (hopefully).  This is an APK for Android phones running on devices with Android 8+ and api level 26+ (this should be the minimum to support augmented reality).

Welcome to Space AR X!

Use your handheld Augmented Reality training device to learn how to launch, navigate and safely land our Space AR X rockets.

Do you have what it takes?

Flaycon 9 is a partially reusable medium-lift launch vehicle designed and manufactured by Space AR X in the United States. Both the first and second stages are powered by Space AR X Marline engines, using cryogenic liquid oxygen and rocket-grade kerosene (RP-1) as propellants.
Unlike most rockets, which are expendable launch systems, since the introduction of the Full Thrust version, Flacon 9 is partially reusable, with the first stage capable of re-entering the atmosphere and landing vertically after separating from the second stage. This feat was achieved for the first time on flight 20 in December 2015.
